title: How to Feed Your Worm Farm | Smash it Down & Add Some Browns!

tasks.task: Starting a worm farm and feeding it.
subtasks: Adding food scraps to the worm farm.
Covering the scraps with browns (carbon-rich materials).
Repeating the process (shove down, cover with browns).

tasks.task: Creating a mnemonic or song for the process.
subtasks: Singing or reciting the process as a song.
